amendment.description: An amendment offered pursuant to the acceptance of the instructions contained in the Watt (NC) motion to recommit. The amendment adds a new paragraph to the bill providing for a rule of construction regarding federal election laws.

vote.text: On agreeing to the House Administration amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on House Administration.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment reported by the House Committee on House Administration.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the House Administration amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the House Administration amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
